pages.text: The Lunar Crystal makes its wearer immune to Levitation. By default, hitting a mob has a 10% chance to inflict Levitation III to the target for 3 seconds. This curio can (rarely) be found in end city chests, and additionally rarely drops from Endermen in the end.

The Lunar Crystal supports the following enchantments:$(br2)$(l)Feather Falling$(): Fall damage is reduced slightly per level (stacks with boots)$(br2)$(l)Power$(): Levitation duration is increased slightly per level$(br2)$(l)Curse of Chromatic Twisting$(): Increases the duration of inflicted Levitation, however the effect is also applied to the wearer and removes Levitation immunity
